content.body: I wonder if `dispatchSnapshot` as a property of events would be clear to developers who have no clue what AsyncContext even is or what it's meant for
content.formatted_body: I wonder if dispatchSnapshot as a property of events would be clear to developers who have no clue what AsyncContext even is or what it's meant for

content.body: well, I guess we don't need it to be clear, we just need them not to use it
* well, I guess we don't need it to be clear, we just need them not to use it by mistake

m.new_content.body: well, I guess we don't need it to be clear, we just need them not to use it by mistake

content.body:
An important thing is that it’s 
googleable
content.formatted_body:
An important thing is that it’s
googleable

content.body: We could be very explicit and say causalAsyncContextSnapshot. Too long?
Anyway, all of these options should be googleable/searchable in mdn so this name search doesn’t have a big downside risk
content.formatted_body: Anyway, all of these options should be googleable/searchable in mdn so this name search doesn’t have a big downside risk

content.body: I think it is ok to have a single property name to be generic but specifically searchable with its holder's name
It might be acceptable, but will be not as convenient for some people
Especially here, this will come up on a lot of autocompletes and people will be trying to figure out what it is
